articles.title: Microsoft offers 50% subscription discounts to Office pirates - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Microsoft is offering discounts of up to 50% on Microsoft 365 subscriptions to those using pirated versions of Microsoft Office willing to switch to a genuine version.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: WhatsApp now lets you set all chats to disappear by default - The Verge
articles.description: WhatsApp’s disappearing messages feature can now be turned on by default for new chats. It’s also getting new time options to let messages disappear after either 24 hours or 90 days, in addition to seven days.
articles.content:
Its disappearing messages feature is getting an upgrade
The new features in action.
